svg.text:
This demo shows a grid network with rich local connections and some remont connections. This feature is specified in the Channel by an expression: with a sureRange, nodes are connected for sure; outside the range, nodes are connected with with a probability propotional to the inverse r-th power of distance, where r is defined by the "exponential" parameter.
When you run the demo, the initiator will broadcast a message. A node turns to be red if it receives the message in one hop; it turn to be green if it receives it more than one hop.

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

svg.text: Send through only the first event to arrive. Discard the rest.
Set to white at the start of the run.
Set to green if the signal is transmited more than 1 hops.
Set to red if the signal is transmited by 1 hop.
Receive the signal and display it:
Send through only the first event to arrive. Discard the rest.
Set to white at the start of the run.
Set to green if the signal is transmited more than 1 hops.
Set to red if the signal is transmited by 1 hop.
